name: Military Commando Battle: The Final Alien Combat
name_original: Military Commando Battle: The Final Alien Combat
description:
Get ready to take the challenge as battle zone commando officer in the most daring missions in history of the army battle fields in Military Commando Battle Strike: The Alien Invasion. This time your enemies are not only humans but Aliens Robots from another planet & Zombies effected from the dangerous virus.
In this extreme action & adventure army commando mission game Military Commando Battle Strike: The Alien Invasion. You have to attack different enemy bases and islands which are taken by the robots aliens and deadly zombies. You will also have a training mission where you must prepare yourself for the advance weapons and army combat techniques. You are expected to take the enemy bases on your own and survive their onslaught. You must find and use the weapons, food and health within these bases and islands. This will be the test of your Special Forces commando training and skills which you have already shown in past missions.
Prepare yourself and download this unforgettable army mission game Military Commando Battle Strike: The Alien Invasion and destroy and kill these robots and zombies who attacked and taken our planet earth. You must accomplish these missions as world forces and people looking towards you to protect our mother land!
Game Features:
1) Nonstop Thrilling Alien and Zombies Missions
2) Splendid 3D graphics
3) Extreme Military Weapons
4) Easy game controls
